PerfectNetExp.abs: -tion后缀 ... adulteration 掺杂, 掺假货 asseveration 断言, 誓言 conflagration 大火(灾),突发.
“伊丽莎白”什么意思？ -... ... Parole（ 含有诺言的意思） Asseveration（ 含有断言的意思） Pledge（ 含有保证的意思）.

list.abs: 词根及词缀 ... persevere v 坚持不懈 asseverate v 正中申明，断言 insight n 洞察力.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... adulterate 掺假 asseverate 郑重声明，断言 grate 磨碎，使人烦燥.

where , Joseph asseverated , " owd Nick " would fetch us as sure as we were living : and , so comforted , we each sought a separate nook to await his advent .约瑟夫断言在那儿‘老尼克’一定会把我们活捉的。我们受到如此帮助之后，便各自找个角落静等它降临。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin asseveratio(n-), from the verb asseverare, from ad- 'to' + severus 'serious'

means.word_mean: 1. a declaration that is made emphatically (as if no supporting evidence were necessary)
